title: Rolling Courage: The Joe Swanson Story
description: Once a man at his physical peak, brought down by a cruel twist of fate. The story of police officer turned olympian, Joe Swanson.
quote: Why don’t you ask me to lay down and die?
altHero: Tony Danza as Joe Swanson winning a wheelchair race
alt1: Swanson in his police uniform ready to fight three dudes holding various weapons
alt2: Swanson discouraged on the floor while his wife helps him up
alt3: a “Special People’s Games” ad on the side of a box of popsicles
alt4: Swanson angrily rolls away from Peter Griffin (Bea Arthur)
